item.title: Splicing
item.description: Location: Chaincode Labs Lightning Residency 2019 Transcript by: Caralie Chrisco Introduction So splicing basically means you have a payment channel, you have a certain capacity of a payment channel and you want to change the capacity on the payment channel. But you don’t want to change your balance right? For balance change,(inaudible) we’ll get some money on it. But splicing really means you want to change the capacity.
